title: Philochasander and Elanira the faire lady of Britaine Wherein is discouered the miserable passions of loue in exile, his vnspeakeable ioy receaued againe into fauour, with the deserued guerdon of perfit loue and constancie. By Henry Petowe.
author: Petowe, Henry.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
